item.title: About
item.description: Born and raised in the land of Cajuína (Teresina, Piauí, Brasil), Leia’s father, Eliane’s husband and a geek since childhood. Activist, ex-president of APISoL and co-founder of Teresina Hacker Clube. Currently, I live in (Belo Horizonte, Minas Gerais, Brasil) and work as a DevOps/SR Engineer at 12min, a startup that summarizes best sellers, in audio and text, that can be read in up to 12 minutes. Lover of gambiarras, robotics and movies.

item.title: print("Hello, World!")
item.description: I’m a “computer guy”. Haha! Sorry, but I had to start with this.
